name: Barbie's Dreamhoard
description:
Hi, I'm Barbie! Come in and explore my dream house and do your best to create a hoard you can be proud of.

LMB object to grab them and manipulate them.

In the coming week I am going to go shopping with my friends to fill my house  with new accessories that catch my eye. I also have some handy work to do around the house to clean things up here and there, as some of my furniture feels like it might be possessed.

This game is based on Jake's endorsement of "Barbie Trashes Her Dreamhouse" which is an art project by Carrie M. Becker over on flickr.
